description: Details required for Condition 6 (Delivery and Service Management Plan) of planning permission 19/00582/FUL(Demolition of existing buildings and erection of a new 80 bed, three-storey dementia nursing home (Use Class C2) with associated gardens, pedestrian and vehicle access, car parking and servicing area)
decision_conditions: With the exception of Postal Deliveries, deliveries shall take place outside of peak hours i.e. deliveries are permitted between 10am and 4pm and 6pm to 8pm. No deliveries shall take place before 8am or after 8pm.Reason:  In order to safeguard the amenities of the surrounding residential occupiers to safeguard highway safety and the free flow of traffic in accordance with Policies DM9 (Managing Vehicle Use for New Development) and Policy DM10 (Design Requirements for New Developments including House Extensions) of the LDF Core Strategy Adopted April 2012.'

With the exception of postal deliveries there shall be a maximum of 10 deliveries / collections per weekReason: In order to safeguard the amenities of the surrounding residential occupiers and to safeguard highway safety and the free flow of traffic in accordance with Policies DM9 (Managing Vehicle Use for New Development) and Policy DM10 (Design requirements for New Developments including House Extensions) of the LDF Core Strategy Adopted April 2012.'
